item.title: Long-Distance Relationship Light
item.description: Timeline May 2018 Project Background A few weeks before my wife and I were to be apart for the summer (due to me studying abroad and her only able to join me there in the fall), my wife stumbled upon these “Long Distance Friendship Lamps.” I loved the idea, but I was less enthusiastic about the fact that the operation of the lamps depended on the continuous operation of the company servers.
